thread.title: The Ultimate Volunteer: Jahmai Mashack's Tennessee Impact
thread.title_full: The Ultimate Volunteer: Jahmai Mashack's Tennessee Impact

author: Tennessee Athletics
title: The Ultimate Volunteer: Jahmai Mashack's Tennessee Impact
text:
The Ultimate Volunteer: Jahmai Mashack’s Tennessee Impact
Long before he set the college basketball world abuzz with an electric buzzer-beater against Alabama, Jahmai Mashack was already a hero on Rocky Top. The Fontana, California, native arrived at Tennessee in 2021 with two goals: to win a bunch of basketball games and to positively impact the Knoxville community. Jahmai accomplished both, leaving behind a unique legacy of leadership and service that perfectly encapsulates the Volunteer Creed: “He that beareth a torch shadoweth himself that he may give light to others.”
Read more at www.youtube.com
